english_example_sentence: If my friend tried a new recipe, I would be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если мой друг попробует новый рецепт, я буду очень рад.
turkish_example_sentence: Arkadaşım yeni bir tarifi denese, çok sevinirim.
